And see how Lady Fortuna is just standing here,

translation.zh: 或许你应该好好审视镜中的自己

translation.en: Maybe the therapist should go to therapy.
translation.zh: 或许治疗师应该接受治疗

translation.en: Am I not getting a falling into place?
translation.zh: 我不会水到渠成吗？

translation.en: Jeez, Catherine, enough.
translation.zh: 天哪 凯瑟琳 够了

translation.en: The whole "left out" thing is really getting old.
translation.zh: “被排除在外”这件事已经没新鲜感了

translation.en: You're the one who's always running away from us every time you get a call.
translation.zh: 你每次接到电话 总会远离我们

translation.en: -I have work. -I'm sorry, let's not fight.
translation.zh: -我有工作 -抱歉 我们不要吵架

translation.en: This time together is supposed to be special.
translation.zh: 这次的聚会理应很特别

translation.en: Oh, my God, Naomi, we're not fighting, we're just talking.
translation.zh: 天哪 娜欧蜜 我们没在吵架 我们只是在说话

translation.en: -That's what life is. -Well, it's very negative.
translation.zh: -生活就是这样 -这很负面

translation.en: Yeah, well, life is negative. That's what Brené Brown said.
translation.zh: 对 生活很负面 布芮尼布朗就是这么说的

translation.en: That's exactly what she did not say.
translation.zh: 她根本没这么说过

translation.en: Abby, what is negative in your life right now?
translation.zh: 艾比 你的生活中 现在有什么负面的东西？

translation.en: You've got amazing friends, you got a great career--
translation.zh: 好吗？你有很好的朋友 -你的事业很棒… -不 我没事业

translation.en: No, I don't.
translation.zh: -你的事业很棒… -不 我没事业

translation.en: Okay? I lost my job.
translation.zh: 好吗？我失业了

translation.en: All right? And it's really stupid to even cry about it.
translation.zh: 好吗？为这件事哭都够蠢的

translation.en: Shit, I mean, people are starving in the world, and there's earthquakes.
translation.zh: 该死 我是说 世上有人没饭吃 有地震

translation.en: And people are shooting at each other, and I'm crying about my stupid poor job.
translation.zh: 人们互相枪杀 我却在为我可怜的破工作在哭泣

translation.en: Abby, honey. That doesn't mean your feelings aren't valid.
translation.zh: 艾比 宝贝 这并不代表你不能有这些感受

translation.en: That's exactly what white privilege is!
translation.zh: 白人特权就是这么回事！

translation.en: Plus, what are we doing to the environment?
translation.zh: 况且 我们在对环境做什么？

translation.en: I mean, we can't-- There's no fish anymore!
translation.zh: 我是说 我们没法…鱼都没有了！

translation.en: All the plastic is...
translation.zh: 所有的塑料

translation.en: filling up in the ocean.
translation.zh: 把海洋都填满了

translation.en: And... there's like one rhinoceros left!
translation.zh: 而且…犀牛的数量屈指可数！

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Why wouldn't she tell us that?
translation.zh: 她干嘛不告诉我们这些事？

translation.en: Some things are too scary to say.
translation.zh: 有些事情太可怕 不能说出来

translation.en: Not to us.
translation.zh: 对我们来说不是

translation.en: You guys don't like Brian?
translation.zh: 你们不喜欢布莱恩？

translation.en: -Oh, my God, we love Brian. -Brian, he's the best.
translation.zh: -天哪 我们很爱布莱恩 -布莱恩 他最棒了

translation.en: -He's a character. -He's so cool.
translation.zh: -他很有个性 -他好酷的

translation.en: -Fucking prince. -Awesome.
translation.zh: -该死的王子 -太好了

translation.en: Where to?
translation.zh: 去哪儿？

translation.en: Well, Abby, what's on the itinerary?
translation.zh: 艾比 日程安排上是什么？

translation.en: You know what? Don't look at that. It doesn't matter. It's stupid.
translation.zh: 知道吗？别看了 不重要 蠢死了

translation.en: Do you think throwing the itineraries out the window was on the itinerary?
translation.zh: 你觉得把日程安排扔出窗外 也是日程安排上的一项内容吗？

translation.en: Guess we'll never know.
translation.zh: 我们大概永远都会知道

translation.en: Guys, left or right? I gotta make a decision.
translation.zh: 各位 左还是右？我得做决定

translation.en: Oh, my God, she texted.
translation.zh: 天哪 她发短信了

translation.en: Jade just texted back.
translation.zh: 玉儿刚刚回短信了

translation.en: She wants us to come over to her art show.
translation.zh: 她希望我们去参加她的艺术展

translation.en: I told you.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过吧 我是说 我知道她会回短信

translation.en: -I mean, I knew that she would text. -Okay, let's go there, then.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过吧 我是说 我知道她会回短信 好 那我们去那里

translation.en: Let's go to the art show, right? That'll be perfect.
translation.zh: 我们去艺术展 对吗？太好了

translation.en: Let's pick a DUI song!
translation.zh: 选一首酒驾歌！

translation.en: Anybody?
translation.zh: 有人要唱吗？

translation.en: -Abby? -Silence is good for now.
translation.zh: -艾比？ -就眼下来说 沉默是金

translation.en: This is a major fuck-up.
translation.zh: 太恐怖了

translation.en: Abby's gonna hate this.
translation.zh: 艾比会深恶痛绝的

translation.en: This wall of shoe boxes should really snap her out of her mood.
translation.zh: 这面鞋盒墙会让她心情好起来的

translation.en: I'll tell you the answer.
translation.zh: 我会告诉你答案

translation.en: "No" and "No, you're not."
translation.zh: “不”和“不 你不是”

translation.en: Abby, I know you don't want to talk about it,
translation.zh: 艾比 我知道你不想谈这件事

translation.en: -but I'm really sorry about your job. -Well, thanks.
translation.zh: 但你失业的事 我深感遗憾 谢谢

translation.en: The one time I can't figure out how to get on Snapchat.
translation.zh: 我就一次搞不清楚怎么上Snapchat

translation.en: One time.
translation.zh: 一次

translation.en: And everybody saw.
translation.zh: 大家都看见了

translation.en: Young people blow.
translation.zh: 年轻人很逊的

translation.en: Isn't Jade so ungodly cute?
translation.zh: 玉儿漂亮得不可思议 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, guys, I'm gonna just say a couple words.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我要说几句话

translation.en: Yeah, so...
translation.zh: 嗯 所以…

translation.en: Art has been my raison d'être
translation.zh: 自从…我第一次有意识开始

translation.en: since... literally my first moment of consciousness.
translation.zh: 艺术就一直是我存在的理由

translation.en: I... can't believe I'm following in the footsteps of my heroes.
translation.zh: 我…简直不敢相信 我在追随我的偶像的脚步

translation.en: O'Keeffe, Kahlo, Warhol, Basquiat,
translation.zh: 奥基弗、卡罗、沃霍尔、巴斯奇亚

translation.en: with my very own show.
translation.zh: 举办自己的展览

translation.en: So, thank you. I'm humbled.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我受宠若惊

translation.en: Clearly.
translation.zh: 很显然

translation.en: Thank you for coming in, too... like, from the city,
translation.zh: 也很感谢大家坐拖车

translation.en: with the caravans and all of you,
translation.zh: 从城里过来 所有人

translation.en: it's... fucking so touching. So, thank you.
translation.zh: 我…感动万分 谢谢

translation.en: So, yeah. Let me get on with it.
translation.zh: 好 开始吧

translation.en: The Nanny was more than a sitcom.
translation.zh: 《天才保姆》 不止情境喜剧这么简单

translation.en: Okay, it was a post-modern psychodrama
translation.zh: 好 它是一部后现代心理剧

translation.en: about classism and ambition in the 1990s.
translation.zh: 说的是20世纪90年代的 阶级歧视和野心

translation.en: You know, Fran Drescher's Fran Fine was an icon.
translation.zh: 法兰卓雪演绎的法兰法恩 是个代表人物

translation.en: Honestly, I mean, a cultural touchstone.
translation.zh: 坦白说 堪称文化试金石 （法兰法恩）

translation.en: God. All her art is Fran Drescher.
translation.zh: 天哪 她的作品都是法兰卓雪

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Yeah, so yeah, I'd like to just open up for some questions or comments.
translation.zh: 对 大家可以提问或发表意见

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 请说

translation.en: It's so contextual, but at the same time, wholly independent.
translation.zh: 很有承上启下的感觉 但与此同时 完全独立

translation.en: Did you do that consciously?
translation.zh: 你是下意识这么做的吗？

translation.en: You know what? I did, yeah.
translation.zh: 知道吗？是的 对

translation.en: It's really a lettera d'amore to The Nanny.
translation.zh: 这真的是写给《天才保姆》的情书

translation.en: But, more importantly, it's a reaction to all of our experiences
translation.zh: 不过更重要的是 这是我们对《天才保姆》全部体验的

translation.en: -surrounding The Nanny. -I never saw The Nanny,
translation.zh: -一种反应 -我从没看过《天才保姆》

translation.en: but I don't want that to stop me from participating in this conversation.
translation.zh: 但我不想这点阻止我参与这次谈话

translation.en: It shouldn't.
translation.zh: 不会的

translation.en: This piece. Am I supposed to feel scared?
translation.zh: 这幅作品 我应该感到害怕吗？

translation.en: Yes. I am so glad you got that vibe.
translation.zh: （不算太可悲） 对 我很高兴你感觉到那种气氛

translation.en: -Also offended. Yeah? -Very. Thank you.
translation.zh: -而且觉得被冒犯了 -是的 非常 谢谢

translation.en: Have you considered doing any other sitcom art?
translation.zh: 你考虑过 要创作其他情境喜剧艺术吗？

translation.en: -Like, is ALF an option? -That's a good question.
translation.zh: -比如《家有阿福》有可能吗？ -问得好

translation.en: I think I'm focusing more on women right now.
translation.zh: 我认为我现在的重点是女性

translation.en: 'Cause, I don't know, I feel like time is up on ALF, right?
translation.zh: 因为 我不清楚 我觉得 《家有阿福》气数已尽 对吧？

translation.en: I have a question.
translation.zh: 我有个问题

translation.en: Do any of you watch TV? Like, is TV still a thing?
translation.zh: 你们中有人还看电视吗？ 电视还存在吗？

translation.en: Like, do you watch those judging competition shows?
translation.zh: 你们看那些 有人担任评审的竞赛节目吗？

translation.en: I've only seen TV in the movies.
translation.zh: 我只在电影中见过电视

translation.en: I knew I was right. Dammit, gotta call my agent.
translation.zh: 我就知道我是对的 该死 我得打给我的经纪人

translation.en: Adrian, comma, confirming I was correct
translation.zh: 亚卓安 逗号 确认我是对的

translation.en: re, colon, streaming V, period, broadcast.
translation.zh: 回复 冒号 流媒体 对 句号 电视广播

translation.en: Shit, I don't have a signal. I gotta go outside.
translation.zh: 该死 没信号 我得去外面

translation.en: Yeah, my oldest kid is 15, and on the verge of becoming...
translation.zh: 我最大的孩子15岁 即将成为

translation.en: this.
translation.zh: 这样的人

translation.en: I just wanna know, how do I stop her from becoming an asshole?
translation.zh: 我只想知道 我怎么能阻止她变成混蛋？

translation.en: I feel like I'm about to take umbrage.
translation.zh: 我感觉我马上要受到冒犯了

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: And you know what else worries me?
translation.zh: 你知道还有什么让我担心吗？

translation.en: It is way too easy for you guys to get porn.
translation.zh: 你们轻而易举就能获得色情片

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: I used to drive miles in the middle of the night
translation.zh: 我曾经大半夜 开数公里

translation.en: just to go to this little newsstand by the bus station
translation.zh: 就为了去到巴士站旁边 那个小小的报摊

translation.en: just to find lesbo porn.
translation.zh: 就为了找女同志色情杂志

translation.en: You guys have it so lucky on the porn front.
translation.zh: 你们真幸运 站在色情片的前线

translation.en: I hadn't thought about it that way before. It's so interesting.
translation.zh: 我以前没这么想过 很有意思

translation.en: No wonder they're so scared of sexuality.
translation.zh: 难怪他们如此害怕性取向

translation.en: They associate it with hard work and fear.
translation.zh: 他们把它跟努力工作和恐惧 联系在一起

translation.en: And driving long distances.
translation.zh: 还有长距离开车

translation.en: I can't with the confidence in these people.
translation.zh: 这些人太自信了 我没法应对

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: So we're putting 'em down because they have healthy self-esteem?
translation.zh: 因为他们有健康的自尊感 我们就要贬低他们吗？

translation.en: I've spent my whole life thinking I suck.
translation.zh: 我这辈子都以为自己很逊

translation.en: You know what happened at my first poetry reading?
translation.zh: 你知道我第一次读诗时 发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: I completely bombed.
translation.zh: 我的表现惨不忍睹

translation.en: No claps. No snaps. Just total silence.
translation.zh: 没人拍手 没人尖叫 一片沉默

translation.en: Till, finally, this one dude, way in the back,
translation.zh: 直到最后 后面有一个人

translation.en: he just turned to his girlfriend and he went, "Oof."
translation.zh: 他转身对他的女朋友说：“太扯了”

translation.en: But you know what? That was an important "oof,"
translation.zh: 但你知道吗？这句“太扯了”很重要

translation.en: because it confirmed to me that I'm a complete piece of shit.
translation.zh: 因为它向我确认了一点 我是个百分百的废物

translation.en: And that's what made me the writer I am today.
translation.zh: 这让我成了作家 取得如今的成就

translation.en: I thank God for that "oof."
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 他说了那句“太扯了”

translation.en: -This girl needs an "oof." -Oof.
translation.zh: -这个女生需要一句“太扯了” -太扯了

translation.en: Jade, we're not trying to hurt anyone's feelings.
translation.zh: 玉儿 我们不想伤害任何人的感情

translation.en: My God, they were born with hurt feelings.
translation.zh: 天哪 他们一出生感情就受伤了

translation.en: Why don't you not blast your feelings all over your best friend, the internet?
translation.zh: 你干嘛不对最好的朋友和互联网 发泄自己的感情？

translation.en: Please, their parents are their best friends.
translation.zh: 拜托 他们的父母是他们最好的朋友

translation.en: Well, that I do like.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这句话

translation.en: You know who my best friend is? My best friend.
translation.zh: 你知道我最好的朋友是谁吗？ 我最好的朋友

translation.en: These women, right here, who I've known for 20-plus years.
translation.zh: 站在这里的这些女人 我认识她们20多年了

translation.en: And yeah, sure, sometimes I want to tell this one to fuck off.
translation.zh: 对 有时候我想叫这个人滚开

translation.en: That's what intimacy looks like.
translation.zh: 亲密感就是这么回事

translation.en: -You want me to fuck off? -What?
translation.zh: -你想我滚开？ -什么？

translation.en: If you all are friends, why are you so mad at each other?
translation.zh: 如果你们是朋友 干嘛对彼此这么生气？

translation.en: We're not mad.
translation.zh: 我们不生气

translation.en: -Crazy, mad, grouchy. Look at this one. -Fascinating.
translation.zh: -疯狂、生气、爱抱怨 看看这个 -真有意思

translation.en: We're not grouchy.
translation.zh: 我们不爱抱怨

translation.en: Guys, please forgive us.
translation.zh: 各位 请原谅我们

translation.en: We've been drinking wine all day,
translation.zh: 我们一整天都在喝酒

translation.en: and we're just not right in our heads right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在头脑不清醒

translation.en: We are exactly where we need to be. We're doing fine. Fran Fine.
translation.zh: 我们身处正确的地方 我们很好 像法兰这么好

translation.en: That's brilliant. Did you see that?
translation.zh: 太精彩了 你看见了吗？

translation.en: Is this part of the show?
translation.zh: 这是展览的一部分吗？

translation.en: That was... incredible.
translation.zh: 太…不可思议了

translation.en: You are amazing. Moms, you're amazing.
translation.zh: 你真棒 妈妈们 你们太棒了

translation.en: Context within context, that's exactly what we're talking about.
translation.zh: 环环相扣 我们就是这个意思

translation.en: Excuse me. Do you have Wi-Fi in here?
translation.zh: 打扰一下 这里有无线网络吗？

translation.en: And then there was one.
translation.zh: 有人来了

translation.en: Tammy, hi.
translation.zh: 谭美 嗨

translation.en: I'm just trying to get a little work done while the girls are at this art show.
translation.zh: 姐妹们在艺术展那里 我想干点工作

translation.en: -Art show? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -艺术展？ -是的

translation.en: Oof, things must have gone really sideways.
translation.zh: 太扯了 事情肯定变得太离谱了

translation.en: -Yeah. -Give me your phone.
translation.zh: -对 -把你的手机给我

translation.en: -I'll get you online. -Oh, my God, awesome. Thank you.
translation.zh: -我会帮你上线 -天哪 太棒了 谢谢

translation.en: Pedro, is the password still "penisgrigio72"?
translation.zh: 佩卓 密码还是“鸡巴灰皮诺72”吗？

translation.en: Thank you. We need a couple of beers here also.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -我们这里还要几瓶啤酒

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Are you guys good pals?
translation.zh: 你们是好朋友吗？

translation.en: We are acquaintances.
translation.zh: 我们是熟人

translation.en: Do you ever get lonely up here, living by yourself?
translation.zh: 你一个人住 不会寂寞吗？

translation.en: No, I love it. Loneliness is for suckers.
translation.zh: 不 我很喜欢 只有孬种才会寂寞

translation.en: 'Cause you know who I can trust? Me.
translation.zh: 因为你知道我能信任谁吗？我自己

translation.en: You know who's never gonna bail on me? Me.
translation.zh: 你知道谁永远不会 放我鸽子吗？我自己

translation.en: Anyway, get your shit done,
translation.zh: 总之 搞定你的事情

translation.en: bring people joy with that fantastic pizza.
translation.zh: 用美味披萨带给人们欢乐

translation.en: I'll be over here hitting bull's-eyes.
translation.zh: 我会来这里玩掷飞镖

translation.en: -Can I ask your advice on something? -Shoot.
translation.zh: 嘿 谭美 你能给我一些建议吗？ 请吧

translation.en: -I'm being offered this TV show. -No, shoot the dart.
translation.zh: -有人提议让我拍电视节目 -不 掷飞镖

translation.en: I'm uncomfortable in any one-on-one situation unless I can win.
translation.zh: 除非我能赢 否则任何一对一的情形 我都觉得不自在

translation.en: Sure. Right, okay.
translation.zh: 好 对 好的

translation.en: Thanks, Val.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 娃儿

translation.en: Do you think you can carry this one over, too?
translation.zh: 你能把这个也搬过去吗？

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Okay, just be very careful.
translation.zh: 好 要非常小心

translation.en: -Oh, of course. -Okay.
translation.zh: -当然了 -好

translation.en: Oh, that smile is so infectious.
translation.zh: 她的笑容太有感染力了

translation.en: I know, it's so ironic, right?
translation.zh: 我知道 真讽刺 对吗？

translation.en: Sorry about my friends.
translation.zh: 关于我的朋友 我很抱歉

translation.en: Oh, no! I love them.
translation.zh: 不！我很喜欢她们

translation.en: People are really liking my show!
translation.zh: 人们真的很喜欢我的展览！

translation.en: Do you think you guys could come back and do that whole,
translation.zh: 你觉得你们可以回来 再做一次

translation.en: "I'm mad at young people" thing again?
translation.zh: 那种“我对年轻人很生气”的表演吗？

translation.en: I can ask.
translation.zh: 我可以问问

translation.en: But to be clear, we're not mad at young people.
translation.zh: 不过话说清楚 我们可没对年轻人很生气

translation.en: Or I'd be mad at myself, right?
translation.zh: 否则我会生自己的气 对吗？

translation.en: You're so funny, Val.
translation.zh: 你真有意思 娃儿

translation.en: I'm happy we met.
translation.zh: 我很高兴我们能认识

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: I like you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你

translation.en: I like you, too.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢你

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
translation.zh: 我能问你一件事吗？

translation.en: I think I know what it is.
translation.zh: 我想我知道是什么

translation.en: I usually charge 800, but...
translation.zh: 我通常收800块 不过

translation.en: I'm gonna give it to you for 600.
translation.zh: 你出600块就够了

translation.en: Talking about the painting?
translation.zh: 你是在说画吗？

translation.en: That's great.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: 'Cause I love your art so much.

translation.en: well, then I'm completely lost.
translation.zh: 那我就不知所措了

translation.en: I am going through a really hard time, and...
translation.zh: 我正在经历艰难时期 而且…

translation.en: I... You know what?
translation.zh: 我…知道吗？

translation.en: God, fuck it!
translation.zh: 老天 去死吧！

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: Fuck. DJ, play that fucking song!
translation.zh: DJ演奏那首该死的歌曲 去死吧！

translation.en: Cut it.
translation.zh: 停下

translation.en: What hard time?
translation.zh: 什么艰难时期？

translation.en: I finally took the BRCA gene test.
translation.zh: 我终于做了乳腺癌易感基因测试

translation.en: And my results came back,
translation.zh: 我的结果出来了

translation.en: and I'm too afraid to call because I'm not ready to hear
translation.zh: 我很害怕 不敢打电话 因为我不想听到

translation.en: that I'm dying of breast cancer. Okay?
translation.zh: 我会死于乳腺癌 好吗？

translation.en: My God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Why isn't anybody telling anybody shit?
translation.zh: 大家为何都有所隐瞒？

translation.en: Because Lady Sunshine was right.
translation.zh: 因为阳光夫人说得对

translation.en: No, she wasn't.
translation.zh: 不 她错了

translation.en: Maybe I should go after her.
translation.zh: 或许我应该去找她

translation.en: There's a slideshow coming up that I think's gonna really lift her spirits.
translation.zh: 马上就会放幻灯片 我觉得这真的会让她振作起来

translation.en: Abby, do you really think a slideshow is gonna make her fears go away?
translation.zh: 艾比 你真觉得幻灯片 会让她的恐惧消失吗？

translation.en: What? I don't know. Maybe.
translation.zh: 什么？我不知道 或许吧

translation.en: Look, Rebecca. I'm just trying to fix this birthday
translation.zh: 听着 瑞贝卡 我只想尽量弥补这个生日

translation.en: so you can have fun, okay? Why is this so difficult?
translation.zh: 让你过得开心点 好吗？ 为何如此艰难？

translation.en: All right, Abby, let's get real here, okay?
translation.zh: 好 艾比 现实点 好吗？

translation.en: You got fired, right? And this planning this birthday
translation.zh: 你被炒鱿鱼了 对吗？策划这次生日

translation.en: is probably the first sense of control you've had in years.
translation.zh: 或许是你多年来第一次有掌控感

translation.en: That's totally okay, but you asked me over and over
translation.zh: 这完全没关系 但你反复问我

translation.en: what I wanted for my birthday, but you didn't listen.
translation.zh: 我生日时到底想要什么 但你不听

translation.en: So let's stop pretending that this weekend is about me
translation.zh: 所以不要假装这个周末的重点是我

translation.en: because it's all about you.
translation.zh: 因为重点是你

translation.en: Don't come after me.
translation.zh: 别来追我

translation.en: I'm not coming after you. This is a dual storm out.
translation.zh: 我不是来追你的 这是两人怒气冲冲地冲出来

translation.en: Where are we going? Do you see them?
translation.zh: 我们要去哪里？看见她们了吗？

translation.en: Naomi, stop.
translation.zh: 娜欧蜜 停下

translation.en: Leave me alone. I want to be by myself.
translation.zh: 别管我 我想独处

translation.en: I wanna be by myself!
translation.zh: 我想独处！

translation.en: Naomi, wait, you're not dying.
translation.zh: 娜欧蜜 等等 你不会死

translation.en: You're gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 你会好起来的

translation.en: Really? How do you know, Val? What are you, an oracle?
translation.zh: 真的？你怎么知道的 娃儿？ 你是什么？先知吗？

translation.en: Are your eyeballs a mammogram?
translation.zh: 你的眼球会做乳房摄影吗？

translation.en: You just scan me, and you know I'm gonna be fine?
translation.zh: 你对我进行扫描 就知道我会没事吗？

translation.en: I don't know, okay? I'm trying to be a nice person.
translation.zh: 我不知道 好吗？ 我只想努力友善一点

translation.en: Can I ask you something? Why did you tip Lady Sunshine?
translation.zh: 我能问你一件事吗？ 你给阳光夫人小费？

translation.en: She charged, like, $500 to tell all of us that we sucked.
translation.zh: 她收了500块 说我们所有人都很逊

translation.en: I can tip whoever the hell I want as much as I want.
translation.zh: 我给谁小费都可以 给多少都可以

translation.en: I'm a grown-ass woman.
translation.zh: 我是个成年女人

translation.en: Good. Go tip the whole world. See how that works for you.
translation.zh: 很好 去给全世界小费吧 看看会怎样

translation.en: This is a nightmare.
translation.zh: 这件事是噩梦

translation.en: Then go home, Jenny.
translation.zh: 那就回家把 珍妮

translation.en: We all know you want to.
translation.zh: 我们都知道你想回家

translation.en: All weekend, all these withering glances, making me feel like two cents.
translation.zh: 整个周末 所有这些咄咄逼人的眼神 让我感觉自己毫无价值

translation.en: Well, what do you want? A round of applause for most planning?
translation.zh: 你想怎样？你策划了大部分活动 需要我们鼓掌吗？

translation.en: Naomi, be a grown-up and call your doctor.
translation.zh: 娜欧蜜 成熟点 给你的医生打电话

translation.en: You are acting like a millennial.
translation.zh: 你表现得像个老顽固

translation.en: How dare--
translation.zh: 你怎敢…

translation.en: -Something bit me! -What did?
translation.zh: -有东西咬了我一口？ -什么东西？

translation.en: Oh, my God! A snake.
translation.zh: 天哪！是蛇

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -No!
translation.zh: -天哪！ -不！

translation.en: -Someone tell me what's happening! -Naomi got bit by a snake!
translation.zh: 快告诉我发生了什么事？ 娜欧蜜被蛇咬了！

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's like the cards.
translation.zh: 天哪 就想牌面上的一样

translation.en: -Old rocks, snakes. -Oh, my God, it's happening.
translation.zh: -老旧的石头 蛇 -天哪 事情发生了

translation.en: Lady Sunshine was for real. I bet if we looked it up on the internet,
translation.zh: 阳光夫人是真的 我敢肯定 如果我们上网查询

translation.en: we'd find out that she's been dead for 50 years.
translation.zh: 会发现她已经死了50年了

translation.en: Oh, my God, my leg is seizing up! Fuck!
translation.zh: 天哪 我的腿动不了了！操！

translation.en: Everybody, stay really calm. We need to elevate it. We need to ice it.
translation.zh: 大家保持冷静 我们需要把腿抬高 在上面放冰块

translation.en: We need to call 911. We're gonna call 911.
translation.zh: 我们需要打给911

translation.en: We're calling 911. Fuck me, there's no signal.
translation.zh: 我们打给911 真该死 没信号

translation.en: -Fucking never service. -Does anyone have a hot spot?
translation.zh: -从来都没信号 -好 有人有热点吗？

translation.en: Does anyone know how to get it brighter?
translation.zh: 有人知道怎么染让它更亮吗？

translation.en: -I just took three pictures. -...then look for brightness...
translation.zh: -我刚刚拍了三张照片 -…然后找亮度…

translation.en: -My phone is so slow. -Oh, my God, I'm gonna die!
translation.zh: -我的手机真慢 -天哪 我要死了！

translation.en: No, you're not gonna die, Naomi.
translation.zh: 不 你不会死 娜欧蜜

translation.en: You're not gonna die, and you know why? 'Cause I'm going to get help.
translation.zh: 你不会死 知道为什么吗？ 因为我要去找帮手

translation.en: Val 2.0!
Val!
translation.zh: 娃儿！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: Shit! It sounds like Val's getting smaller!
translation.zh: 该死！娃儿听起来越来越远了！

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: -Wait! -What's going on?
translation.zh: -等等！ -怎么回事？

translation.en: -What was that? -Val fell down the hill.
translation.zh: -那是什么声音？ -娃儿从山坡上滚下去了

translation.en: -I'm going. -What? You're going?
translation.zh: -我要走了 -什么？你要走了？

translation.en: Wait, Jenny's going?
translation.zh: 等等 珍妮要走了？

translation.en: Someone's gotta help her.
translation.zh: 有人得帮她

translation.en: Why don't we just go back the way we came in?
translation.zh: 我们干嘛不沿着 刚才过来的路线回去？

translation.en: No! Hell no! There's snakes back there.
translation.zh: 不！绝对不行！那里有蛇

translation.en: -No, Jenny! -What's happening?
translation.zh: -不要 珍妮！ -怎么回事？

translation.en: -Jenny? -Jenny, no!
translation.zh: -珍妮？ -珍妮 不要！

translation.en: Jenny? Oh, my God, how is she not falling?
translation.zh: 珍妮？天哪 她怎么没摔倒？

translation.en: Hey, Jenny!
translation.zh: 嘿 珍妮！

translation.en: Wow. Did she ski as a kid?
translation.zh: 哇 她小时候滑过雪吗？

translation.en: Man, she's keeping that wine safe.
translation.zh: 老天 她把那瓶酒保护得很好

translation.en: I am not gonna die
translation.zh: 我不会在这个山坡上

translation.en: of a poisonous snake bite on the top of this hill.
translation.zh: 因为被毒蛇要一口就一命呜呼

translation.en: Not today, Satan! I got this.
translation.zh: 今天不会 撒旦！我没问题

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -I'm going! -Okay, now, Naomi's going.
translation.zh: -我要走了 -好 现在娜欧蜜也走了

translation.en: Help me out of this cart, I need to go down the hill.
translation.zh: 把我从车上弄下来 我需要下山

translation.en: What about your back?
translation.zh: 你的背呢？

translation.en: -You know what? It's my birthday. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -知道吗？今天是我的生日 -天哪

translation.en: And I'm not gonna lay here and watch the fucking clouds go by.
translation.zh: 我不会躺在这里 看云彩飘过

translation.en: Now, get me off this cart.
translation.zh: 把我从车上弄下来

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -Naomi, you can do it! -There's wine down here!
translation.zh: -娜欧蜜 你可以的！ -下面有酒！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 去吧！

translation.en: -Oh, boy. -Oh, cripes.
translation.zh: -天哪 -老天爷

translation.en: -No... -Jump!
translation.zh: -不要… -跳！

translation.en: Naomi!
translation.zh: 娜欧蜜！

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: Is everybody okay?
translation.zh: 大家都好吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: That fixed my back!
translation.zh: 我的背好了！

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: I'm gonna take the easy way.
translation.zh: 我要用简单的方法

translation.en: -You did it. That was crazy. -We did it.
translation.zh: -你成功了 太疯狂了 -我们成功了

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Easy.
translation.zh: 慢慢来

translation.en: Just get to the bush, and you're fine from there.
translation.zh: 去树丛那里 在那里就没事了

translation.en: That's what she said.
translation.zh: 她就是这么说的

translation.en: Just let go! We're here for you!
translation.zh: 放手！我们在这里等你！

translation.en: You got this, Abby.
translation.zh: 你没问题的 艾比

translation.en: -I'm gonna let go! -You can do it!
translation.zh: -我会放手！ -你可以的！

translation.en: You're braving the wilderness, Abby!
translation.zh: 勇敢面对狂野 艾比！

translation.en: -You got it! Yeah! -Of course I'm the last one left.
translation.zh: -你成功了！好耶！ -当然了 我是最后一个

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Hello? Oh, hi!
translation.zh: 喂？嗨！

translation.en: Hi! The whole team's there. Hi, guys!
translation.zh: 嘿 嗨！整个团队都在那里 大家好！

translation.en: -Cath, come on! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -小凯 来吧！ -好耶

translation.en: Great, go ahead.
translation.zh: 好 走吧

translation.en: Are you kidding me? She's taking a call?
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？她在接电话

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: So you're saying that you think I would be stupid to pass on this offer.
translation.zh: 所以你说如果我不接受这个提议 就是个笨蛋

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna be stupid. I'm gonna pass.
translation.zh: 我就当笨蛋吧 我不接受

translation.en: You know what? Life is just going by me faster than I thought it would,
translation.zh: 知道吗？生命从我身边溜走 比我想象中要快很多

translation.en: and I'm tired of chasing the next big thing.
translation.zh: 我厌倦了追逐更大的梦想

translation.en: I-- It's kept me from living in the present.
translation.zh: 我…这让我没法活在当下

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna hang up before I change my mind.
translation.zh: 好 在我改变主意之前 我要挂了

translation.en: In case you're wondering, I said no to the job!
translation.zh: 万一你们想知道 我拒绝那份工作了！

translation.en: -What is she saying? -We can't hear you!
translation.zh: -她说什么？ -我们听不见！

translation.en: I wanna be able to go on vacation, you know?
translation.zh: 我想可以去度假！

translation.en: I'm so sorry, we can't hear you!
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我们听不见你的声音！

translation.en: But here's the thing you do have to know about me.
translation.zh: 但你们得了解我这个性格

translation.en: I love working.
translation.zh: 我热爱工作

translation.en: I do. I love it.
translation.zh: 的确如此 我热爱工作

translation.en: But I'm gonna come down there.
translation.zh: 但我会下去

translation.en: I'm coming down now,
translation.zh: 我这就下来

translation.en: because I choose you.
translation.zh: 因为我选择了你们

translation.en: -I mean, should we nod? -I can't hear a word.
translation.zh: -我是说 我们应该点头吗？ -我一个字都没听见

translation.en: I didn't get one word of that.
translation.zh: 我一个字都没听见

translation.en: Adrian, comma, send ambulance to Sacred Moon Winery, period.
translation.zh: 亚卓安 逗号 派救护车到圣月酒庄来 句号

translation.en: Friend bitten by snake, exclamation point, question mark.
translation.zh: 朋友被蛇咬了 叹号 问号

translation.en: Snake emoji. Send.
translation.zh: 蛇表情符号 发送

translation.en: Swan dive maybe wasn't the best idea.
translation.zh: 燕式跳水不明智

translation.en: Gonna feel that one tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天会感觉到痛的

translation.en: But it was glorious.
translation.zh: 但很壮观

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, so the snake wasn't venomous.
translation.zh: 好 蛇没有毒

translation.en: We treated it with some antibacterial cream, and...
translation.zh: 我们用抗菌药膏处理过了

translation.en: you're all good.
translation.zh: 你安然无恙

translation.en: Well, I'm definitely not all good.
translation.zh: 我肯定不是安然无恙

translation.en: Little condescending.
translation.zh: 有点傲慢

translation.en: So, we almost died on that hill because of a non-venomous snake?
translation.zh: 所以因为一条无毒的蛇 我们差点在那座山坡上死掉了

translation.en: Yeah, you know, honestly, I think it might have been a sharp twig.
translation.zh: 坦白说 我想 有可能是一根锋利的树枝

translation.en: Sometimes those catch you at the wrong angle.
translation.zh: 有时候 角度不对会看错

translation.en: No, it was a snake. We saw a snake.
translation.zh: 不 是蛇 我们看到蛇了

translation.en: Also, I'm a grown woman.
translation.zh: 而且我是成年女人

translation.en: I think I know when I've been bit by a snake.
translation.zh: 我想我知道自己被蛇咬过

translation.en: Let me guess, Dr. Dickswing,
translation.zh: 让我猜猜 自大狂医生

translation.en: it's because of her period.
translation.zh: 因为她的例假

translation.en: That's the problem with the medical establishment, no one listens to women.
translation.zh: 这就是医疗机构的问题 没人听女人的话

translation.en: Right. This is why more women die of heart attacks, right here.
translation.zh: 对 所以这里有更多女人死于心脏病

translation.en: Also, I don't appreciate it
translation.zh: 而且 你给我结果的时候

translation.en: when you grin at me while giving me my results.
translation.zh: 对我咧嘴笑 我也不喜欢

translation.en: 'Cause I could have died.
translation.zh: 因为我有可能会死

translation.en: When I get home,
translation.zh: 我回家后

translation.en: and if there is venom in my ankle,
translation.zh: 如果我的脚踝里有蛇毒

translation.en: I'm gonna come back here and make sure you personally suck it out.
translation.zh: 我会回来这里 确保你亲自把它吸出来

translation.en: -Yeah. -Suck it.
translation.zh: -对 -吸出来

translation.en: I'm not entirely sure what's happening here.
translation.zh: 我不确定这里是怎么回事

translation.en: -Thank you, that'll be all. -Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢 没事了 -好 谢谢

translation.en: Also, tell your mom to pick you up after your shift, Doogie!
translation.zh: 还有 下班后叫你妈过来接你 道吉

translation.en: Fucking dickweed.
translation.zh: 该死的自大狂

translation.en: So should we...
translation.zh: 我们应该

translation.en: head on back to the house?
translation.zh: 打道回府了吗？

translation.en: We need to make a call.
translation.zh: 我们需要打一通电话

translation.en: Call doctor...?
translation.zh: 打给医生…

translation.en: Melton.
translation.zh: 莫尔顿

translation.en: Call Dr. Melton.
translation.zh: 打给莫尔顿医生

translation.en: Hello, Dr. Melton's office.
translation.zh: 喂 莫尔顿医生办公室

translation.en: Hi, this is Naomi Reid.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是娜欧蜜雷德

translation.en: I'm calling for the results of my BRCA test.
translation.zh: 我打来是想询问 我的乳腺癌易感基因测试结果

translation.en: Yes, let me get the results for you. Let me put you on a brief hold, okay?
translation.zh: 好 我帮你把结果拿过来 请稍等 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: That was a really good Naomi.
translation.zh: 真的很棒 娜欧蜜

translation.en: No matter what this news is, we got you, okay?
translation.zh: 无论是什么消息 我们都会支持你 好吗？

translation.en: Hi, Mrs. Reid?
translation.zh: 嗨 雷德女士？

translation.en: Hi, yes, your blood work came back negative.
translation.zh: 嗨 是的 你的血液检查结果为硬性

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: And what were the results of my fart test?
translation.zh: 我的屁测试结果是怎样的？

translation.en: I don't have it.
translation.zh: 我没有

translation.en: Hey, Janiece.
translation.zh: 嘿 珍妮丝

translation.en: How's your son? Still on the chess team?
translation.zh: 你儿子怎么样了？ 还在国际象棋队吗？

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, big nerd. -It's the only way to raise 'em.
translation.zh: -对 十足的书呆子 -只有这样才能养大他

translation.en: Hey, Tammy's here.
translation.zh: 嘿 谭美来了

translation.en: How'd you know where we were at?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我们在哪里？

translation.en: Well, I heard on the scanner that six middle-aged ladies
translation.zh: 我听到扫描仪上说六个中年女性

translation.en: went to the ER. Figured it had to be you guys.
translation.zh: 去了急诊室 我想肯定是你们

translation.en: So, do you still want me to call that taxi for you?
translation.zh: 你还要我帮你叫出租车吗？ （玉儿 手机）

translation.en: No. My friend will drive us.
translation.zh: 不 我的朋友可以开车

translation.en: Did not know we were using the f-word.
translation.zh: 不知道你会用“朋友”这个词

translation.en: I am deleting Jade.
translation.zh: 我要删掉玉儿

translation.en: I'm too cool for her, I think.
translation.zh: 我觉得我太酷了 她配不上

translation.en: -Indeed. -Poor thing.
translation.zh: -确实 -可怜的姑娘

translation.en: Well, at least you got a great painting of the Nanny out of the deal.
translation.zh: 至少你拿到一幅《天才保姆》的好画

translation.en: What did that cost you? Like, 50 bucks?
translation.zh: 你花了多少钱？50块？

translation.en: Yeah, about that.
translation.zh: 嗯 差不多吧

translation.en: -Let me take that plant off your hands. -You deserve it, Janiece.
translation.zh: -让我把那个植物从你们手上拿走 -你值得拥有 珍妮丝

translation.en: Okay, come on, truck's out front.
translation.zh: 好 来吧 车在前面

translation.en: What happened to you guys anyway?
translation.zh: 你们到底怎么了？

translation.en: -Fell down a hill. -Seems about right.
